methods.name: createApplication
methods.desc:
Create an abstracted account application.
This is not part of ARC58 and implementation specific.

args.name: controlledAddress
args.desc: The address of the abstracted account. If zeroAddress, then the address of the contract account will be used

args.name: admin
args.desc: The admin for this app

methods.name: arc58_changeAdmin
methods.desc: Attempt to change the admin for this app. Some implementations MAY not support this.

args.name: newAdmin
args.desc: The new admin

methods.name: arc58_pluginChangeAdmin
methods.desc: Attempt to change the admin via plugin.

args.name: plugin
args.desc: The app calling the plugin

args.name: allowedCaller
args.desc: The address that triggered the plugin

args.name: newAdmin
args.desc: The new admin

methods.name: arc58_getAdmin
methods.desc:
Get the admin of this app. This method SHOULD always be used rather than reading directly from state
because different implementations may have different ways of determining the admin.

methods.name: arc58_verifyAuthAddr
methods.desc: Verify the abstracted account is rekeyed to this app

methods.name: arc58_rekeyTo
methods.desc: Rekey the abstracted account to another address. Primarily useful for rekeying to an EOA.

args.name: addr
args.desc: The address to rekey to

args.name: flash
args.desc: Whether or not this should be a flash rekey. If true, the rekey back to the app address must done in the same txn group as this call

methods.name: arc58_canCall
methods.desc: check whether the plugin can be used

args.name: plugin
args.desc: the plugin to be rekeyed to

returns.desc: whether the plugin can be called via txn sender or globally

methods.name: arc58_rekeyToPlugin
methods.desc: Temporarily rekey to an approved plugin app address

args.name: plugin
args.desc: The app to rekey to

args.name: methodOffsets
args.desc:
The indices of the methods being used in the group
if the plugin has method restrictions these indices are required to match
the methods used on each subsequent call to the plugin within the group

methods.name: arc58_rekeyToNamedPlugin
methods.desc: Temporarily rekey to a named plugin app address

args.name: name
args.desc: The name of the plugin to rekey to

args.name: methodOffsets
args.desc:
The indices of the methods being used in the group
if the plugin has method restrictions these indices are required to match
the methods used on each subsequent call to the plugin within the group

methods.name: arc58_addPlugin
methods.desc: Add an app to the list of approved plugins

args.name: app
args.desc: The app to add

args.name: allowedCaller
args.desc:
The address of that's allowed to call the app
or the global zero address for all addresses

args.name: lastValidRound
args.desc: The round when the permission expires

args.name: cooldown
args.desc: The number of rounds that must pass before the plugin can be called again

args.name: adminPrivileges
args.desc: Whether the plugin has permissions to change the admin account

args.name: methods
args.desc: The methods that are allowed to be called for the plugin by the address

methods.name: arc58_removePlugin
methods.desc: Remove an app from the list of approved plugins

args.name: app
args.desc: The app to remove

args.name: allowedCaller
args.desc: The address of that's allowed to call the app

args.name: methods
args.desc:
The methods that to remove before attempting to uninstall the plugin
or the global zero address for all addresses

args.name: name
args.desc: The plugin name

args.name: app
args.desc: The plugin app

args.name: allowedCaller
args.desc:
The address of that's allowed to call the app
or the global zero address for all addresses

args.name: lastValidRound
args.desc: The round when the permission expires

args.name: cooldown
args.desc: The number of rounds that must pass before the plugin can be called again

args.name: adminPrivileges
args.desc: Whether the plugin has permissions to change the admin account

args.name: methods
args.desc: The methods that are allowed to be called for the plugin by the address

args.name: name
args.desc: The plugin name
